name: CP_OIEP

items.name: Change Package Transport to Git
items.instruction: Enable, set to read events and verify event triggers, if queue-based. Verify linked business rules are included.
Enable, set to read events and verify event triggers.

items.name: eCatalogs
items.instruction: Price/Terms List/Collections from Lists must be recreated manually. Ignore impact analysis.

items.name: stepsys
items.instruction: Users created on target systems use temporary password. Reset manually if passwords are managed by STEP.

signedGlobalXml:
<STEP-ProductInformation ContextID="Context1"  WorkspaceID="Main"  ExportTime="2024-05-20 01:33:07"    UseContextLocale="false">

  <IntegrationEndpoints>
    <OutBoundIntegrationEndpoint ID="STEPConfigurationToGit" Description="STEP Configuration To Git" UserTypeID="OutboundEndpoint user-type root" ProcessPluginID="Export" QueueForEndpoint="OutboundQueue" QueueForProcssing="Out" MaxNumberOfActiveBackgroundProcesses="1" MaximumAgeOfFailedBackgroundProcesses="604800000" MaximumNumberOfFailedBackgroundProcesses="100" MaximumAgeOfSucceededBackgroundProcesses="604800000" MaximumNumberOfSucceededBackgroundProcesses="100" TransactionType="STRICT" ResponsibleUserID="STEPSYS" EnableRetry="false" UseCrossContext="false" DataSourcePluginID="EventQueueDataSourcePlugin" DeliveryMethodPluginID="com.stibo.configurationmanagement.repository.delivery.ChangePackageGitDeliveryPlugin" MultiThreadCount="1" RefreshCollections="false">

</entries>

DataSourcePluginConfiguration:

</Parameters>

DeliveryMethodPluginConfiguration:
<Parameters>
  <Parameter ID="ContextId" Type="com.stibo.util.integrationendpoints.ContextParameter">Context1</Parameter>
  <Parameter ID="ConvertBusinessRulesToEditableFormat" Type="java.lang.Boolean">false</Parameter>
  <Parameter ID="DirectoryTemplate" Type="java.lang.String">$changepackageid$</Parameter>
  <Parameter ID="RemoteRepositoryUri" Type="com.stibo.util.integrationendpoints.ConfigStringCollectionLOVParameter">ChangePackageGitDelivery.RemoteRepoUri._4</Parameter>
  <Parameter ID="RepositoryAccessMethod" Type="com.stibo.configurationmanagement.repository.changepackagedelivery.ChangePackageGitDeliveryPlugin$RepositoryAccessMethod">HTTPS</Parameter>

  <Parameter ID="RepositoryUsername" Type="com.stibo.util.integrationendpoints.ConfigStringCollectionLOVParameter">ChangePackageGitDelivery.RemoteRepoUsername._1</Parameter>
  <Parameter ID="SplitWebUiConfigurations" Type="java.lang.Boolean">true</Parameter>
</Parameters>

<EventSpecificExportConfiguration>
  <ExportConfiguration MatchAllTypes="false">
    <EventType>15</EventType>

    <ExportManagerConfig>
      <ExportManagerConfig ContentMode="" ContextID="Context1" ECatalogID="" EffectiveDate="" EffectiveDateTimeZoneID="America/New_York" ExecutionMode="" ExportSelectedProducts="false" InheritProductData="true" LeafProductExport="true" Name="" ProcessTemplate="Exporter" ResolveInlineRefs="true" ScheduleDate="" SelfContainedReferences="false" UseContextLocale="false" Version="2" VersionID="" WorkspaceID="Main" isSorted="false">
        <Delivery Name="File">
          <Parameter Name="FileNameTemplate">$filename-$timestamp(yyyy-MM-dd_HH.mm.ss).$extension</Parameter>
        </Delivery>
        <Format Name="AdvancedSTEPXML">
          <Parameter Name="CrossContextChooser">No</Parameter>
          <Parameter Name="Recorder"><?xml version='1.0'?><STEP-ProductInformation><ChangePackages ExportSize="Selected"/></STEP-ProductInformation></Parameter>
